narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  Facility meets the minimum requirements for a Class C
exhibitor licensee.  In addition the following topics were discussed,  renewal application, medical records and record
keeping requirements.
In order to complete the licensing process the applicant needs to forward a check for the appropriate amount to 
USDA-APHIS-AC
920 MAIN CAMPUS DR.
Raleigh NC 27606
919 855-7100
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner
